channel.title: 2 question, please answer!
channel.description:
#1.How do I make monster's be placed in a certain area? Like making a man stand in a certain spot?
#2.How do I make a monster drop a specific item? Like making a man drop a dragon battleaxe?

item.title: 2 question, please answer!
item.dc:creator: @masterlop masterlop
item.description:
@masterlop wrote:

Ok, thanks for the first answer, but the 2nd answer I already tried. I copied for ex. Dad’s drop of rune boots and pasted on a hellhound spot and instead of 4% i changed it to 100% and it doesn’t drop it at all. Can someone clarify that for me?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 question, please answer!
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

[quote=“masterlop, post:1, topic:191745”]#1.How do I make monster’s be placed in a certain area? Like making a man stand in a certain spot?

#2.How do I make a monster drop a specific item? Like making a man drop a dragon battleaxe?[/quote]

Answer 1:
Right click autospawn.cfg > open with > Notepad

Add the id, co-ords etc.

Answer 2:
NpcDrops.cfg > open with > Notepad

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–

Read full topic

item.title: 2 question, please answer!
item.dc:creator: @CupofTea CupofTea
item.description:
@CupofTea wrote:

Change the Y and X Location in the autospawn.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: 2 question, please answer!
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

go into the autospawn.cfg for making the man be in a certain spot

and into npcdrops.cfg for making it drop items

Read full topic
